lead_paragraph: A Korean man faces counts of robbery and assault as hate crimes, as well as other charges, in connection with two episodes in Flushing, Queens.

headline.print_headline: Attacks on 2 Chinese Women Lead to Hate-Crime Charges
headline.main: Queens Man Charged With Hate Crimes in Attacks on 2 Chinese Women

snippet: A Korean man faces counts of robbery and assault as hate crimes, as well as other charges, in connection with two episodes in Flushing, Queens.
abstract: Queens prosecutors announce hate crime charges against Key S Lee in connection with robbery and assault of two Chinese women in Flushing; Lee, who is Korean, is on record as saying he targeted Chinese people because he does not like them.
